name: AROS Fixed
postCreateCommand: npm install -g pnpm turbo && pnpm install && docker run -d --name postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=aros -p 5432:5432 postgres:15-alpine && sleep 5 && PGPASSWORD=postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d aros -c 'CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS organizations (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), name TEXT); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customers (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), name TEXT, phone TEXT, organization_id UUID REFERENCES organizations(id)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS vehicles (id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), plate TEXT, model TEXT, brand TEXT, customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(id)); INSERT INTO organizations (id, name) VALUES ('''11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111''', '''Officina Demo''') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING; INSERT INTO customers (id, name, phone, organization_id) VALUES ('''22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222''', '''Mario Rossi''', '''3331234567''', '''11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111''') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING; INSERT INTO vehicles (id, plate, model, brand, customer_id) VALUES ('''44444444-4444-4444-4444-444444444444''', '''AB123CD''', '''Panda''', '''Fiat''', '''22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222''') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;' && echo DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/aros > apps/voice-dashboard/.env && echo DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/aros > apps/admin-dashboard/.env
